Plot: A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.
Title: Homefront
Writer: Sylvester Stallone (screenplay), Chuck Logan (based on the novel by)
Actors: Jason Statham, James Franco, Izabela Vidovic, Kate Bosworth
tomatoConsensus: While it boasts a capable cast, the disappointingly dull Homefront hearkens back to classic action thrillers without adding anything to the genre.
